WHAT'S A PODCAST?:
Podcasts are like radio on the Internet. ![Russ Hanneman](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/612797837882077184/VidQco_F_400x400.jpg)
They are available episode by episode online. Some of them are on actual radio, too! %[How do I listen to podcasts?](postback:how_do_i_listen)
HOW DO I LISTEN TO PODCASTS?:
Are you on iPhone? There should be an app called Podcasts built-in. I also recommend Pocket Casts or Overcast if you don't like that one.
Android folks, Pocket Casts is my #1 recommendation, but most podcasts (except, WBEZ shows like Serial and This American Life, arguably the two most popular podcasts) are available inside Google Play Music which is built-in. %[Thanks! Can you recommend any podcasts?](postback:recommend)
THANKS! CAN YOU RECOMMEND ANY PODCASTS?: That's what we do here. Type HIT ME or click this button %[Hit Me](postback:hit_me)
